title: Greek Cobb Salad
directions: Combine the olive oil, red wine vinegar, garlic, dry mustard, thyme, oregano and salt and pepper in a small bowl or jar and whisk or shake the dressing well.Â Place the drained chickpeas in a bowl and pour 1-2 tablespoons of the dressing on the chickpeas to marinate for 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1 small clove garlic pressed or minced
1/4 teaspoon kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
3 hard boiled eggs peeled and chopped
1/2 cup sliced roasted red bell pepper
